cap:
Drinking coffee in the cold air slowly seeps warmth into the palms of your hands.

Risuko "Phew... winter coffee really is special."

It is cold up high, but the warmth of the coffee does not change.

Risuko "Drinking it here feels nice too."

Even so, today the cold creeps deeply into the body.

Risuko "...It is pretty cold today." 
Suzuko "Yeah. The wind is cold."

When they move closer, the cold softens just a little.

Risuko "If we do this, it feels a bit warmer." 
Suzuko "Eek... I am cold!"

Next comes the power of food to warm them up.

Risuko "When you eat, your body warms right up!" 
Suzuko "I see... you are right."

The cold remains, but when they snuggle together, their hearts warm first.

Risuko "...When we stick close, it is warm." 
Suzuko "Yeah. This is the best."

Next is the closest one around, the cat.

Risuko "...So warm." 
Suzuko "The cat is used to this."

The fluffy representative, the rabbit.

Risuko "With all this fur, it is totally different." 
Suzuko "But staying still must be hard."

Once she gets an idea, she cannot stop.

Risuko "How about this?" 
Suzuko "...That makes my heart race a bit."

The big deer looks very warm.

Risuko "...So reliable." 
Suzuko "It does feel reassuring."

Next is Suzuko. Everyone has their own way.

Risuko "That works too, huh." 
Suzuko "Yeah, it slowly warms you."

After trying many things, they find the answer.

Risuko "...This is the best." 
Suzuko "Yeah, no doubt."

â€¦Just when they thought so, they let their guard down.

Risuko "...Ah, that was unconscious." 
Suzuko "You surprised me!"

Once you touch something fluffy, it is hard to let go.

Risuko "...I do not know when to stop." 
Suzuko "You are completely captured by the fluff."

As they walk, they begin to notice their surroundings.

Risuko "There are a lot of sheep around here." 
Suzuko "You are right. They are everywhere."

White fluff is dotted across the snow.

Risuko "...Their faces look like dots." 
Suzuko "Yeah. Little faces tucked in all that fluff."

Fluffy sheep and fluttering butterflies.
Before they knew it, the air felt a little like a story.

Risuko "...It feels like a dream." 
Suzuko "Yeah. But we are awake."

Before they realize it, there are far more than expected.

Risuko "...Um, one sheep, two sheep..." 
Suzuko "That is not something you need to count."

At that moment, the color of the sky begins to change.

Risuko "Ah, rain..." 
Suzuko "It looks like it will start."

The light drizzle quickly turns into pounding rain.

Risuko "This is impossible!" 
Suzuko "Let us hurry!"

At last, they reach a place where they can shelter from the rain.
Inside, a single lamb stands alone.

Risuko "Such heavy rain. Maybe the lamb is hiding from it too." 
Suzuko "Being alone must feel a bit lonely." 

As if noticing their voices, the lamb suddenly walks toward them.

The lamb, perhaps feeling relieved, playfully clings to Risuko.

Risuko "...Maybe it felt relieved when someone came." 
Suzuko "Yeah. We should look for its flock."

When you feel safe, both body and heart relax.

Risuko "...It climbed on me." 
Suzuko "It looks calmer now."

But the sky starts to look different again.

Risuko "Let us go home for now." 
Suzuko "Yeah. It looks suspicious again."

They arrive home. The winter rain has chilled them to the bone.

Risuko "S-so cold..." 
Suzuko "The lamb must be tired too."

In front of the fireplace, they wrap themselves in blankets.
Their bodies and hearts slowly warm up.

Risuko "...So calming." 
Suzuko "It is a different world from outside."

It has grown completely dark, but since the rain has stopped,
they decide to step outside just a little.

Risuko "Let us look around just a bit." 
Suzuko "Do not push yourself."

In the night, the moonlight shows them the way.

Risuko "Ah... there it is! A fluffy mass spotted!" 
Suzuko "Safe! Now no one can call it lost."

When everyone gathers, the surroundings become very quiet.

Risuko "...Beautiful. It feels like being inside a luxury carpet." 
Suzuko "It is so quiet. If we talk, this fluff might run away."

The lamb returns to the side of its companions.
This is a safe place, and just watching it warms the heart.

Risuko "This is the warmest place." 
Suzuko "Yeah. A place where you feel safe is truly warm."
